summary: This document is an email chain from July 24, 2019, regarding the medication administration for an inmate (presumably Jeffrey Epstein) who was on Psychological Observation at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York. The correspondence involves a U.S. Public Health Service Chief Pharmacist discussing the inmate's claim of not receiving his constipation medication (docusate sodium/Colace).

persons.name: CAPT
persons.role: U.S. Public Health Service Chief Pharmacist
persons.context: The Chief Pharmacist at MCC New York corresponding about an inmate's medication issue, specifically regarding docusate sodium (Colace) that was allegedly not being administered.

connections.description: CAPT indicates they will talk to RN about the inmate's medication, suggesting a working relationship within the medical staff.
CAPT mentions they could ask MD for a new prescription if needed, indicating a professional healthcare team relationship.

events.title: Medication Inquiry for Inmate on Psychological Observation
events.description: An email chain discusses an inmate on Psychological Observation who claims he has not been receiving his constipation medication (docusate sodium 100mg/Colace). The Chief Pharmacist reviews the fill date and coordinates with staff to ensure administration.

events.title: Medication Fill for Inmate
events.description: The inmate's docusate sodium 100mg (Colace) was filled for a 30-day supply.

locations: MCC New York, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is dated July 24, 2019, which is during Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration prior to his death.
It concerns an inmate on 'Psychological Observation' who reported not receiving his constipation medication (docusate sodium/Colace).
The medication was filled for a 30-day supply on July 12, 2019, suggesting a recent prescription.
The correspondence involves U.S. Public Health Service medical staff at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The document is marked as potentially containing SENSITIVE information for official use only.
